name: The Endless Journey of Eggs
description: This is a tiny casual game where you control some egg-like creatures to go on an endless journey. The journey is dangerous: there are thorns along the way that are sharp enough to tear them apart. The journey is also exciting: there are friends of the same kind waiting to be called up to join the team. The journey is sad, too: they know for sure that one day they are going to lose their friends and everything they treasure. However, no matter what the journey is like, they have no choice but to keep going. And this is what life is like—for them, and for you.
